ManSection.Returns: the group \mathrm{SL}_2(\mathbb{Z}/p^\lambda\mathbb{Z}) with conjugacy classes set to the format we use.
a list representing a character of \mathrm{SL}_2(\mathbb{Z}/p^\lambda\mathbb{Z})
ManSection.Description: Converts the modular data (S,T), which must have level dividing p^ld, into a character of \mathrm{SL}_2(\mathbb{Z}/p^\lambda\mathbb{Z}), presented in a form matching the conjugacy classes used in SL2Reps_SL2Conj.
Constructs and tests all irreps of level dividing p^ld by checking their positions in Irr(G).
